https://www.googleapis.com/auth/chrome.m.description: See detailed information about apps installed on Chrome browsers and devices managed by your organization
See reports about devices and Chrome browsers managed within your organization

description: The Chrome Management API is a suite of services that allows Chrome administrators to view, manage and gain insights on their Chrome OS and Chrome Browser devices.
name: chromemanagement

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

countChromeAppRequests.description: Generate summary of app installation requests.

customer.description: Required. Customer id or "my_customer" to use the customer associated to the account making the request.

orderBy.description: Field used to order results. Supported fields: * request_count * latest_request_time

orgUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of results to return. Maximum and default are 50, anything above will be coerced to 50.

pageToken.description: Token to specify the page of the request to be returned.

get.description: Get a specific app for a customer by its resource name.

name.description: Required. The app for which details are being queried. Examples: "customers/my_customer/apps/chrome/gmbmikajjgmnabiglmofipeabaddhgne@2.1.2" for the Save to Google Drive Chrome extension version 2.1.2, "customers/my_customer/apps/android/com.google.android.apps.docs" for the Google Drive Android app's latest version.

get.description: Get a specific app for a customer by its resource name.

name.description: Required. The app for which details are being queried. Examples: "customers/my_customer/apps/chrome/gmbmikajjgmnabiglmofipeabaddhgne@2.1.2" for the Save to Google Drive Chrome extension version 2.1.2, "customers/my_customer/apps/android/com.google.android.apps.docs" for the Google Drive Android app's latest version.

get.description: Get a specific app for a customer by its resource name.

name.description: Required. The app for which details are being queried. Examples: "customers/my_customer/apps/chrome/gmbmikajjgmnabiglmofipeabaddhgne@2.1.2" for the Save to Google Drive Chrome extension version 2.1.2, "customers/my_customer/apps/android/com.google.android.apps.docs" for the Google Drive Android app's latest version.

countChromeVersions.description: Generate report of installed Chrome versions.

customer.description: Required. Customer id or "my_customer" to use the customer associated to the account making the request.

filter.description: Query string to filter results, AND-separated fields in EBNF syntax. Note: OR operations are not supported in this filter. Supported filter fields: * last_active_date

orgUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of results to return. Maximum and default are 100.

pageToken.description: Token to specify the page of the request to be returned.

customer.description: Required. Customer id or "my_customer" to use the customer associated to the account making the request.

filter.description: Query string to filter results, AND-separated fields in EBNF syntax. Note: OR operations are not supported in this filter. Supported filter fields: * app_name * app_type * install_type * number_of_permissions * total_install_count * latest_profile_active_date * permission_name

orderBy.description: Field used to order results. Supported order by fields: * app_name * app_type * install_type * number_of_permissions * total_install_count

orgUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of results to return. Maximum and default are 100.

pageToken.description: Token to specify the page of the request to be returned.

findInstalledAppDevices.description: Generate report of devices that have a specified app installed.

appId.description: Unique identifier of the app. For Chrome apps and extensions, the 32-character id (e.g. ehoadneljpdggcbbknedodolkkjodefl). For Android apps, the package name (e.g. com.evernote).

customer.description: Required. Customer id or "my_customer" to use the customer associated to the account making the request.

filter.description: Query string to filter results, AND-separated fields in EBNF syntax. Note: OR operations are not supported in this filter. Supported filter fields: * last_active_date

orderBy.description: Field used to order results. Supported order by fields: * machine * device_id

orgUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of results to return. Maximum and default are 100.

pageToken.description: Token to specify the page of the request to be returned.

permissions.description: Output only. Permissions requested by an Android app.

GoogleChromeManagementV1AndroidAppPermis.description: Permission requested by an Android app.

type.description: Output only. The type of the permission.

appId.description: Output only. Unique store identifier for the item. Examples: "gmbmikajjgmnabiglmofipeabaddhgne" for the Save to Google Drive Chrome extension, "com.google.android.apps.docs" for the Google Drive Android app.

chromeAppInfo.description: Output only. Chrome Web Store app information.

detailUri.description: Output only. The uri for the detail page of the item.

homepageUri.description: Output only. Home page or Website uri.

iconUri.description: Output only. A link to an image that can be used as an icon for the product.

isPaidApp.description: Output only. Indicates if the app has to be paid for OR has paid content.

privacyPolicyUri.description: Output only. The URI pointing to the privacy policy of the app, if it was provided by the developer. Version-specific field that will only be set when the requested app version is found.

publisher.description: Output only. The publisher of the item.

reviewNumber.description: Output only. Number of reviews received. Chrome Web Store review information will always be for the latest version of an app.

reviewRating.description: Output only. The rating of the app (on 5 stars). Chrome Web Store review information will always be for the latest version of an app.

revisionId.description: Output only. App version. A new revision is committed whenever a new version of the app is published.

serviceError.description: Output only. Information about a partial service error if applicable.

GoogleChromeManagementV1BrowserVersion.description: Describes a browser version and its install count.

channel.description: Output only. The release channel of the installed browser.

count.description: Output only. Count grouped by device_system and major version

deviceOsVersion.description: Output only. Version of the system-specified operating system.

system.description: Output only. The device operating system.

version.description: Output only. The full version of the installed browser.

googleOwned.description: Output only. Whether the app or extension is built and maintained by Google. Version-specific field that will only be set when the requested app version is found.

isCwsHosted.description: Output only. Whether the app or extension is in a published state in the Chrome Web Store.

isTheme.description: Output only. Whether the app or extension is a theme.

minUserCount.description: Output only. The minimum number of users using this app.

permissions.description: Output only. Every custom permission requested by the app. Version-specific field that will only be set when the requested app version is found.

siteAccess.description: Output only. Every permission giving access to domains or broad host patterns. ( e.g. www.google.com). This includes the matches from content scripts as well as hosts in the permissions node of the manifest. Version-specific field that will only be set when the requested app version is found.

supportEnabled.description: Output only. The app developer has enabled support for their app. Version-specific field that will only be set when the requested app version is found.

GoogleChromeManagementV1ChromeAppPermiss.description: Permission requested by a Chrome app or extension.

accessUserData.description: Output only. If available, whether this permissions grants the app/extension access to user data.

documentationUri.description: Output only. If available, a URI to a page that has documentation for the current permission.

type.description: Output only. The type of the permission.

GoogleChromeManagementV1ChromeAppRequest.description: Details of an app installation request.

appId.description: Output only. Unique store identifier for the app. Example: "gmbmikajjgmnabiglmofipeabaddhgne" for the Save to Google Drive Chrome extension.

detailUri.description: Output only. The uri for the detail page of the item.

iconUri.description: Output only. A link to an image that can be used as an icon for the product.

latestRequestTime.description: Output only. The timestamp of the most recently made request for this app.

requestCount.description: Output only. Total count of requests for this app.

hostMatch.description: Output only. This can contain very specific hosts, or patterns like "*.com" for instance.

GoogleChromeManagementV1CountChromeAppRe.description: Response containing summary of requested app installations.

nextPageToken.description: Token to specify the next page in the list.

requestedApps.description: Count of requested apps matching request.

totalSize.description: Total number of matching app requests.

GoogleChromeManagementV1CountChromeVersi.description: Response containing requested browser versions details and counts.

browserVersions.description: List of all browser versions and their install counts.

nextPageToken.description: Token to specify the next page of the request.

totalSize.description: Total number browser versions matching request.

GoogleChromeManagementV1CountInstalledAp.description: Response containing details of queried installed apps.

installedApps.description: List of installed apps matching request.

nextPageToken.description: Token to specify the next page of the request.

totalSize.description: Total number of installed apps matching request.

GoogleChromeManagementV1Device.description: Describes a device reporting Chrome browser information.

deviceId.description: Output only. The ID of the device that reported this Chrome browser information.

machine.description: Output only. The name of the machine within its local network.

GoogleChromeManagementV1FindInstalledApp.description: Response containing a list of devices with queried app installed.

devices.description: A list of devices which have the app installed. Sorted in ascending alphabetical order on the Device.machine field.

nextPageToken.description: Token to specify the next page of the request.

totalSize.description: Total number of devices matching request.

appId.description: Output only. Unique identifier of the app. For Chrome apps and extensions, the 32-character id (e.g. ehoadneljpdggcbbknedodolkkjodefl). For Android apps, the package name (e.g. com.evernote).

appInstallType.description: Output only. How the app was installed.

appSource.description: Output only. Source of the installed app.
enumDescriptions: Generally for extensions and Chrome apps.

appType.description: Output only. Type of the app.

browserDeviceCount.description: Output only. Count of browser devices with this app installed.

description.description: Output only. Description of the installed app.

disabled.description: Output only. Whether the app is disabled.

displayName.description: Output only. Name of the installed app.

homepageUri.description: Output only. Homepage uri of the installed app.

osUserCount.description: Output only. Count of ChromeOS users with this app installed.

permissions.description: Output only. Permissions of the installed app.

GoogleRpcStatus.description: The `Status` type defines a logical error model that is suitable for different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs. It is used by [gRPC](https://github.com/grpc). Each `Status` message contains three pieces of data: error code, error message, and error details. You can find out more about this error model and how to work with it in the [API Design Guide](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/errors).

code.description: The status code, which should be an enum value of google.rpc.Code.

details.description: A list of messages that carry the error details. There is a common set of message types for APIs to use.

additionalProperties.description: Properties of the object. Contains field @type with type URL.

message.description: A developer-facing error message, which should be in English. Any user-facing error message should be localized and sent in the google.rpc.Status.details field, or localized by the client.

title: Chrome Management API
